verses.verse: In the year <S%H8141><s%> that king <S%H4428><s%> Uziyah-yahu <S%H5818><s%> died <S%H4194><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also <S%H853><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon a throne <S%H3678><s%>, high <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, and his train <S%H7757><s%> filled <S%H4392><s%> <S%H853><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%>.

Above <S%H4605><s%> it stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the S'rafims <S%H8314><s%>: each one <S%H259><s%> had six <S%H8337><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%>; with twain <S%H8147><s%> he covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>, and with twain <S%H8147><s%> he covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%>, and with twain <S%H8147><s%> he did fly <S%H5774><s%> <S%H8787><s%>.

And one cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto another, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Holy <S%H6918><s%>, holy <S%H6918><s%>, holy <S%H6918><s%>, is the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>: the whole earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4393><s%> of his glory <S%H3519><s%>.

And the posts <S%H520><s%> of the door <S%H5592><s%> moved <S%H5128><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at the voice <S%H6963><s%> of him that cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and the house <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with smoke <S%H6227><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I, Woe <S%H188><s%> is me! for I am undone <S%H1820><s%> <S%H8738><s%>; because I am a man <S%H376><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>, and I dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of a people <S%H5971><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>: for mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the King <S%H4428><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>.

Then flew <S%H5774><s%> <S%H8799><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the S'rafims <S%H8314><s%> unto me, having a live coal <S%H7531><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>, which he had taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the tongs <S%H4457><s%> from off the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

And he laid <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it upon my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Lo, this hath touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy lips <S%H8193><s%>; and thine iniquity <S%H5771><s%> is taken away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and thy sin <S%H2403><s%> purged <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8792><s%>.

Also I heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H136><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, Whom shall I send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and who will go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for us? Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I, Here am I; send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye indeed <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, but understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not; and see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye indeed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, but perceive <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not.

Make the heart <S%H3820><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> fat <S%H8080><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, and make their ears <S%H241><s%> heavy <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, and shut <S%H8173><s%> <S%H8685><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%>; lest they see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with their eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with their ears <S%H241><s%>, and understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with their heart <S%H3824><s%>, and convert <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and be healed <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I, YY <S%H136><s%>, how long? And he answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Until the cities <S%H5892><s%> be wasted <S%H7582><s%> <S%H8804><s%> without inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and the houses <S%H1004><s%> without man <S%H120><s%>, and the land <S%H127><s%> be utterly <S%H8077><s%> desolate <S%H7582><s%> <S%H8735><s%>,

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> have removed <S%H7368><s%> men <S%H120><s%> far away <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and there be a great <S%H7227><s%> forsaking <S%H5805><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

But yet in it shall be a tenth <S%H6224><s%>, and it shall return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and shall be eaten <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8763><s%>: as a teil tree <S%H424><s%>, and as an oak <S%H437><s%>, whose substance <S%H4678><s%> is in them, when they cast <S%H7995><s%> their leaves: so the holy <S%H6944><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be the substance <S%H4678><s%> thereof.
